attributes.action: Support our campaign to keep the D H Lawrence's heritage sites open
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In light of the current economic difficulties across the country
BROXTOWE Borough Council's proposed budget for 2009/10 will probably mean taking £60,000 from D H Lawrence's Heritage Centre, Durban House, meaning full or partial closure.

This Controversial proposal will be analysed by a member working group after the budget is finalised by full council in March.

This resource is vital to the area.
It is used by schools and university students to provide the kind of hands on education that is so hard to find.
Dog shows, craft and fun days for the local community.
It’s a place to promote art and crafts in the area.
The services include a Wedding venue, group visits, craft and fun days, catering facilities, gift shop and galleries. 

Its loss would be another blow to the local area
